name: Skip the sea
description: Otters are aquatic mammals in the subfamily of Lutrinae. They are playful animals and appear to engage in various behaviors for sheer enjoyment, such as taking naps, skipping stones on water and then dancing on the beach until night. They are on the other hand very bad players when they lose at a game. The day of an otter is made of much love, a bit of fluff and very much malice <3
